sub_title: Business Unit Director | Driving Digital Transformations and Innovative Solutions in IT & Supply Chain | Empowering Organizations for Value-driven Success
summary:
As a Business Unit Director for MoveBeyond, I am a leader who is passionate about driving digital transformations and delivering innovative solutions in the areas of IT and Supply Chain. With a strong background in project and change management, I am committed to enable organizations to deliver value faster and more efficiently.

I believe that leadership is about empowering others to achieve their full potential. I work closely with my team to create a culture of collaboration and trust, where everyone feels valued and supported. I believe that this approach is critical to driving successful change initiatives and delivering exceptional results.

At MoveBeyond, we focus on project and change management in the areas of IT and Supply Chain. Through our work, we are helping organizations to transform their operations and drive innovation in their industries. By leveraging our project and change management approach, we are able to deliver value to our clients faster and more efficiently, while also fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

If you're looking for a leader who can drive change and deliver results in a complex, rapidly evolving environment, I would be happy to connect. Let's work together to create a better future through innovation and creativity.

treasury_media.title: Move Beyond verwelkomt Business Unit Directeur Jurjen Bloo : Updates : Move Beyond

profile_positions.description:
As a Business Unit Director at Move Beyond, I spearheaded the transformation of an unstable unit into a thriving, high-performing team. Confronted with challenges like lack of stability, unclear vision, and disengaged employees, I took decisive action to drive positive change and establish a solid foundation for success.

🚀 Transforming Operational Efficiency: I implemented a heartbeat model to foster transparency and created an operational framework that clarified expectations for the team. By restructuring my management team, I ensured alignment with the new vision and bolstered the expertise needed for success.

💡 Empowering Consultants' Growth: Recognizing the need for clearer career paths, I developed the "growth" model, providing consultants with defined expectations and a roadmap for advancement. This approach empowered consultants to take control of their professional development, resulting in higher job satisfaction and mastery in their roles.

🌟 Enhancing Quality and Collaboration: Addressing operational challenges, I revamped the quality model, introducing the "spring" approach. This model promoted collaboration between consultants and their shadow managers, fostering continuous learning and coaching. 

💼 Strategic Workforce Management: To address previous issues with employee management, I revamped the recruitment process and established a streamlined governance structure. By improving collaboration between the operation manager and the business development team, I ensured a better alignment of consultants' skills with client assignments. 

🔝 Driving Business Growth: Leading a newly formed business development team, I facilitated their integration by providing comprehensive training and equipping them with the knowledge of Move Beyond's strategic direction. Through a focus on account management and rebuilding client relationships from scratch, we secured recurring revenue and forged valuable partnerships.
profile_positions.title: Business Unit Director

profile_positions.description:
As a results-driven Director Consulting Services at CGI, I thrive on delivering value and forging lasting partnerships. With unwavering dedication, I spearhead growth initiatives and champion excellence.

🤝 Cultivating Dynamic Client Relationships: I actively develop and nurture robust relationships with our client, EDSN. Through strategic collaboration and proactive engagement, I foster enduring partnerships built on trust, mutual understanding, and shared success.

💼 Driving Business Expansion: With a strategic mindset and sharp business acumen, I spearhead the expansion of our business with  EDSN. By leveraging market insights, innovative strategies, and impactful negotiations, I secure key contracts, establish new revenue streams, and unlock unprecedented growth opportunities.

👥 Empowering High-Performing Teams: Leading a diverse team of 23 FTE members, representing 13 nationalities and achieving a balanced gender ratio, I actively foster an inclusive environment where individual brilliance thrives. By assigning, recruiting, and supporting the career development of team members, I empower them to reach their full potential and align their expertise with EDSN's evolving needs.

🌱 Fostering Team Development and Expertise: I am passionate about fostering the growth and development of our team, ensuring their capabilities and expertise align with EDSN's requirements. Through mentorship, training programs, and strategic initiatives, I empower our team to remain at the forefront of industry advancements.

🏆 Pinnacle Achievement: My most significant accomplishment in this role was securing the prestigious "Computable Awards 2021" in the "Large-Scale ICT Project" category. This recognition highlights our team's unwavering dedication, innovative solutions, and seamless execution that drove transformative outcomes for our clients.
profile_positions.title: Director Consulting Services

profile_positions.description:
As the Deputy Delivery Manager for the Centralisation Allocation, Reconciliation, and Measurement Data (C-ARM) program at EDSN, I led software development and testing for the central solution, C-ARM.

⚡ Driving Agile Transformation: I initiated a new way of working, enabling teams to embrace Agile methodologies and deliver results faster. Key achievements include:
- Implementing Agile rituals and Program Increment cadence, fostering collaboration and aligning teams for success.
- Establishing an effective Agile framework in Jira, streamlining processes and enhancing efficiency.
- Coaching Scrum masters, empowering them to lead their teams with agility and adaptability.
- Leading Scrum-of-Scrums meetings, promoting cross-team collaboration and resolving dependencies.
- Overseeing five high-performing Scrum teams, driving coordinated progress towards program objectives.

📊 Data-driven Decision Making: I implemented a real-time information dashboard powered by the Delivery Analytics solution. Key accomplishments include:
- Transforming raw data files into valuable insights, linking data to the delivery/value chain.
- Leveraging diverse data sources to create fact-based reports that reveal the actual situation.
- Utilizing advanced analytics to predict future outcomes, empowering stakeholders with foresight.

🤖 Streamlined Test Automation: To enhance efficiency and ensure rigorous quality assurance, I led the implementation of an automated regression test using the Robot Framework within a CI/CD environment. Key achievements include:
- Establishing a new way of working, restructuring three Scrum teams, and setting clear goals.
- Creating a laser-focused environment that prioritized the right areas for testing.
- Delivering an impressive 993 automated test cases, reducing manual effort and enhancing accuracy.
- Leveraging the power of the Robot Framework to optimize testing processes and streamline deployments.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Delivery Manager

profile_positions.description:
As the Solution Owner leading the Advanced Analytics Team at CGI, I drive transformative outcomes for our projects and clients. I spearhead the production of impactful management reporting, presentations, and ad hoc analyses that fuel data-driven decision making, operational efficiencies, and performance improvements.

💡 Data-driven Collaboration: Collaborating closely with business partners and senior management, I play a pivotal role in helping their organizations succeed. Key accomplishments include:
- Partnering with stakeholders to understand their unique needs and challenges, aligning analytics solutions to drive tangible results.
- Leveraging data insights to support strategic decision making and provide actionable recommendations.
- Driving cross-functional collaboration, fostering a culture of data-driven excellence across the organization.

🗺️ Product Visionary: As the owner of the Delivery Analytics solution, I am accountable for its success. Key achievements include:
- Crafting the Product Roadmap, aligning it with organizational goals and client needs.
- Leading the design and delivery of innovative product features and functionalities.
- Driving continuous improvement, ensuring our solution remains at the cutting edge of analytics capabilities.
- Identifying new propositions and innovation opportunities, staying ahead of market trends and evolving client requirements.

📊 Tools of Transformation: Leveraging state-of-the-art tools, I empower our team to deliver exceptional results. Key proficiencies include:
- Utilizing JIRA for efficient project management and agile collaboration.
- Harnessing the power of NEO4J and MongoDB for robust data storage and retrieval.
- Leveraging Python and Panda's for advanced data analysis and modeling.
- Utilizing PowerBI to create visually compelling dashboards and reports that drive actionable insights.
profile_positions.title: Solution Owner Delivery Analytics

profile_positions.description:
As the Vice Chairman of CGI Next, the community for professionals at CGI Netherlands under the age of 36, I drive initiatives that promote personal development, foster alignment between senior management and younger employees, enhance employee retention, and create a sense of belonging among our diverse community of 500 individuals.

🌱 Nurturing Talent: I spearhead programs and events that empower young professionals to unlock their full potential. Key achievements include:
- Initiating personal development workshops and training sessions, equipping our members with the skills needed to thrive in their careers.
- Collaborating with senior management to bridge the generational gap and foster a culture of inclusivity, innovation, and mutual understanding.
- Implementing mentorship programs, connecting experienced professionals with aspiring talent to foster growth and professional guidance.

🤝 Building Connections: I establish a strong sense of community and belonging among our members. Key accomplishments include:
- Organizing engaging events that bring professionals together, fostering networking opportunities and collaborative partnerships.
- Creating platforms for open dialogue and knowledge sharing, facilitating cross-team collaboration and idea exchange.
- Promoting diversity and inclusivity, ensuring all voices are heard and valued within our dynamic community.

💡 Driving Engagement and Retention: I implement strategies to enhance employee satisfaction and retention. Key initiatives include:
- Developing initiatives that promote work-life balance, well-being, and a positive work environment.
- Collaborating with HR and senior management to address the needs and aspirations of young professionals, fostering a sense of purpose and career growth.
- Championing recognition programs to celebrate achievements and motivate our members to excel.
profile_positions.title: Vice President of CGI NEXT

profile_positions.description:
As an Agile Coach at Vereniging COIN, I embarked on a transformative journey to assess and enhance the organization's business agility maturity. Collaborating closely with stakeholders, I empowered product owners to develop a future roadmap that aligns with the strategic goals of Vereniging COIN.

🔍 Assessing Business Agility: I conducted the CGI Business Agility Assessment, a comprehensive evaluation that shed light on areas for improvement. Key accomplishments include:
- Pinpointing specific areas in need of enhancement, enabling targeted interventions for maximum impact.
- Utilizing the insights gained from the assessment to drive transformative changes and optimize organizational processes.

📈 Implementing Lean Portfolio Management: To streamline operations and enhance productivity, I led the implementation of Lean Portfolio Management practices. Key achievements include:
- Aligning strategic goals with portfolio-level decision making.
- Collaborating with product owners to develop a prioritization framework.
- Establishing a transparent approach to portfolio management, fostering efficiency and informed decision making.

💡 Cultivating a Culture of Agility: I facilitated workshops and initiatives focused on fostering an agile culture within the organization. Key accomplishments include:
- Promoting a growth mindset and embracing change as a catalyst for innovation and continuous improvement.
- Driving awareness and understanding of Agile principles and practices across teams.
- Encouraging collaboration, transparency, and adaptability to enhance productivity.

🔄 Implementing Program Increments: I introduced Program Increments to create a cadence of iterative development and alignment within the organization. Key initiatives include:
- Establishing a framework that ensures timely and high-quality product increments aligned.
- Promoting transparency and visibility, enabling stakeholders to track progress and make informed decisions.
profile_positions.title: Agile Coach

profile_positions.description:
As a Product Owner at Liberty Global, I lead the Business Intelligence Team, empowering the Global Delivery Organization to make data-driven decisions and steer the organization towards success.

📊 Enabling Data-driven Insights: I am accountable for the Product Roadmap, Product Design, and implementation of the (Software) Factory Dashboard. Key achievements include:
- Creating a comprehensive dashboard that provides valuable insights across all Global Delivery programs.
- Developing and implementing essential indicators, such as Release Health, Scope Dynamics, End-to-End overview, Workflow Bottlenecks, Quality Control, PMI, and Test Coverage.
- Partnering closely with stakeholders to understand their unique needs, aligning analytics solutions to drive tangible results.
- Leveraging data insights to support strategic decision making and providing actionable recommendations.

💡 Fostering Data-driven Excellence: I drive a culture of data-driven excellence across the organization. Key accomplishments include:
- Collaborating cross-functionally to embed data-driven decision making into the fabric of the organization.
- Empowering teams to leverage data insights in their day-to-day operations and strategic initiatives.
- Advocating for the adoption of analytics tools and practices to drive efficiency, effectiveness, and innovation.

🔍 Advanced Data Analysis and Visualization: I harness the power of cutting-edge tools and techniques to derive meaningful insights. Key proficiencies include:
- Leveraging NEO4J and MongoDB for robust data storage and retrieval.
- Utilizing Python and Panda's for advanced data analysis, modeling, and predictive analytics.
- Harnessing the visualization capabilities of PowerBI to create visually compelling dashboards and reports that drive actionable insights.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
As a Program Manager at Liberty Global, I was entrusted with the responsibility of implementing transformative initiatives across the Global Delivery Organization. 

📊 Project Health Check: I led the implementation of the Project Health Check, enabling comprehensive project assessment. Key accomplishments include:
- Established a reporting cycle to measure project health, ensuring transparency and early identification of potential issues.
- Developed and implementing target KPIs that serve as benchmarks for project performance.

⚡ Proactive Risk Management: I executed rigorous Project Risk Reviews, mitigating risks and driving actionable recommendations. Key achievements include:
- Identified major risks within strategic programs and implementing effective mitigating actions.
- Established an Enterprise Risk Management process, ensuring systematic risk assessment, governance, and reporting.

🔄 Project Management Excellence: I implemented best-practice Project Management principles across all Global Delivery projects. Key initiatives include:
- Driving the adoption of Project Management principles, enhancing the maturity level of projects.
- The implementation of a Continuous Delivery framework, enabling streamlined project execution and faster value delivery.

🔝 Resource Management: I optimized resource allocation and utilization across global delivery projects. Key accomplishments include:
- Implemented a resource management process, governance, checklists, and reporting mechanisms.
- Developed target KPIs to track resource utilization and drive cost savings through improved resource efficiency.

🚀 Agile Transformation: I led a Proof of Concept (POC) for the Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), driving agility at scale. Key achievements include:
- Successfully delivered a SAFe POC as part of the Global Delivery Roadmap Project, demonstrating the benefits of agile practices.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to foster collaboration and improve time-to-market.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Binnenlandse Zaken en Koninkrijksrelaties

profile_positions.description: IS Playground is the Young Professional network for the service business unit: Infrastructure Services within Capgemini Netherlands. The main goal of IS Playground is getting Young Professionals connected with Capgemini and with their colleagues. By defining a vision and strategy for IS Playground we were able to growth to approximately 100 members. We organized several activities, focussing on personal development and networking within an relaxed environment. IS Playground has become an network where Young Professionals are willing to support each other to improve their professional skills and increase their knowledge.
profile_positions.title: President/Founder IS Playground

profile_positions.description:
On request of the Capgemini SAP Solution division I was asked to develop multiple reporting formats to gain insight into current projects and the financial status of these projects.

In my role as Business Analyst I performed in-depth interviews, workshops and designed reporting formats of the cost, budget, FTEs and the progression of the various projects that were running at that time.

The implementation of the reports was done by shared-PMO team in India, under my command.

This resulted in the timely delivery of the reports mentioned above and improved control of management on the progress, costs and results of the projects. The management of the SAP devision was satisfied with the new reports on the quality and timely delivery of reports.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst
